name: kana-labs
description: We have built a core foundation layer of aggregated bridges and blockchains on which the next-gen tools for DeFi and Gamefi would be built - an ecosystem for seamless transactions, a layer-1 for Web3 and games to bridge through.Lastly, we have the cheapest + fastest swap rates across on our dapp. Our smart wallet features - AA (Account Abstraction), social logins and everything customised.
description_short: Friendly Super-app for DeFi. Building the Future of web3
